name: Commit, Push, and Create PR
description: Commit changes, push, and automatically create PR (auto-generate title and description, auto-request Copilot review)

action.message:
I will commit changes, push, and create a PR.

Steps:
1. Check changes
2. Identify task number or Issue number
3. Auto-generate commit message
4. git add, commit, push
5. Auto-generate PR title and description (in English)
6. Create PR via GitHub MCP
7. Auto-request code review from GitHub Copilot

Please provide task number or Issue number (e.g., task-1.1 or issue-42)
